See also: lokal and lokál

German[edit]

German Wikipedia has an article on:
Lokal
Wikipedia de

Etymology[edit]

From French local, from Latin localis.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /loˈkaːl/
  • Rhymes: -aːl

Noun[edit]

Lokal n (genitive Lokals or Lokales, plural Lokale)

  1. A restaurant, especially when small and/or traditional; a pub that serves hot food; an inn
  2. (in certain compounds) A room or facility used for public services.
    Wahllokal ― polling station
    Wartelokal ― waiting room

1Now uncommon, see notes

Synonyms[edit]

  • (pub serving food): Gaststätte; Gastwirtschaft; Wirtschaft; Restaurant
